Detailed Description

Configure the ADC IT.


Defines

#define Adc_clear_flag()   (ADCSRA &= (1<<ADIF) )
#define Adc_disable_it()   (ADCSRA &= ~(1<<ADIE) )
#define Adc_enable_it()   (ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIE) )
